alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Northern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 3:26PM EST until March 11 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Northern Erie and Crawford counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Surfaces that remained wet or slushy through the daylight hours today may turn icy and slick as temperatures drop after sunset this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
